Kaisa Kaunonen wrote:

> Hi again,
> I simply checked out from Sourceforge CVS a new version of Heritrix
> this morning and the build went through although it had some 33
> warnings in javadoc section.

Thats odd that it would start working like that (The javadoc warnings we 
need to fix but they're harmless).

>
> Then I tried to run Heritrix from
> ï¿½/target/heritrix-1.5.0/bin/heritrix-1.5.0/bin
> I used port 8081 because on 8080 there's already Apache Tomcat
> 5.5.7 running.
>
> Unfortunately I'm still having problems at this stage.
> (Does Tomcat disturbe Heritrix in some mysterious way? should there be
> a directory target/classes/org/archive/crawler/jspc somewhere? no such
> thing seen)

Retry Kaisa. The below is an issue w/ precompilation of jspc pages. I 
broke it w/ a commit yesterday trying to fix our build under maven 1.1. 
The change has since been reverted.

St.Ack

>
